channel.title: The majority of french people are dumb
channel.description:
Aahahah this is hilarious, a 2nd grader could have gotten this right.
http://break.com/index/56-percent-of-french-people-are-stupid.html
Seems America > French after all :rolleyes:

item.title: The majority of french people are dumb
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Nah, this isn’t true. The majority of French people aren’t dumb, they’re just assholes who would give the wrong answer when he asks the audience just to make him lose. The guy sitting across from the French Regis Philbin is the dumb one.

Read full topic
item.source: The majority of french people are dumb
